attributes.action: Boris Johnson should resign for his complete mishandling & indecision over Covid
attributes.additional_details:
Like many others, owning a small business - I have watched as my business limos through with now no end goal or plan out. 

A year after the crisis starts they are finally discussing closing borders. Lockdown number three and the highest deaths in Europe with no sign of it slowing. 

The country needs leadership who make decisions on time, and follow through on their words.

The damage to lives, businesses and mental health is fast approaching the point of no return.
attributes.background:
Parliament should hold Boris Johnson accountable, as well as his cabinet for the indecisions and back and forth that has cost lives and businesses. 

Hold a vote of no confidence in Boris Johnson now, demand the resignations of Health secretary and Education Secretary.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
